originalText.text: Really cozy, nice atmosphere, excellent staff that really payed attention with a warm and personal touch.  Good music also. Could need some more lights outside, the cozy inside made it look closed from the outside. Maincourse and dessert where perfectly made, I just didnt enjoy the mustard with the vegetarian dish, my mistake.

text.text: Really cozy, nice atmosphere, excellent staff that really payed attention with a warm and personal touch.  Good music also. Could need some more lights outside, the cozy inside made it look closed from the outside. Maincourse and dessert where perfectly made, I just didnt enjoy the mustard with the vegetarian dish, my mistake.

originalText.text:
I hate to leave a negative review, but we went here on our anniversary, to grab some drinks after we had dinner elsewhere. The two cocktails we had were amazing, and when our waitress came back to take our next order we asked for two shots, one tequila and one mezcal. She had noted that those sounded really good, so we asked if she wanted to take one with us, and she excitedly agreed. She brought back three shots and we took them, and a few minutes later brought us our bill. Now we were prepared to cover her shot, but we didn't realize that she chose a $36 and 38 shot for both her and my fiance. We didn't make a fuss about it in the moment because we didn't want to make a big deal out of it, but that really soured our experience. $38 for a shot (for herself too), without asking which tier or brand we wanted? Additionally, as we hate to leave bad tips, we still tipped 15% on top of the entire bill. We felt taken advantage of and we will not be going back.

Update: added stars because the owner has offered to refund us for the shots, which we happily accepted. Thank you David!

originalText.text: The Wooly captures that genuine NYC vibe we all love and crave. Its inviting, nostalgic interior harmoniously merges with a modern touch. Envision yourself relaxing on the plush velvet banquettes, indulging in a delightful cocktail, all the while casually and flirtatiously observing the chic crowd. The service, unfailingly warm and welcoming, complements the restaurant's prime location in the heart of Nolita/Soho. It's a harmonious fusion of old-world charm and modern sophistication, making every moment spent here an experience truly worth savoring. Get the hamburger! üç∏üçî‚ú®

originalText.text: Love the cozy atmosphere! The details in this place were immaculate. Great service and had the Bend and Snap cocktail which was unlike anything I‚Äôve had before. So refreshing! For food we just got the olives and fries but wow‚Ä¶ truly some of the best fries I‚Äôve had in a while. Will definitely go again and recommend to everyone :)

originalText.text: Interesting bar around Soho.. it looked greater from the outside than it was inside... We sat on a table near the window, as the bar was unfortunately occupied by a private event... It got pretty cold and we even had to wear our coats... However, drinks were ok and the staff was also really polite ... Wine selection was also pretty poor, so if you would like a glass of wine better try another bar in the area ..
